segments.text: Good morning , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to check out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course sir . What's your name and your room number , PLS ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , here is your bill , Mr . Remington .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which of these is my bill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry sir . I forgot to explain that to you . This one is an allowance slip . We made a mistake in your bill and overcharged you 120 dollars . So we had to write up an allowance slip and deduct 120 dollars from your bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . So this is the bill then and the total is ... ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Down here , 800 dollars . How do you wish to settle your account , sir , in cash or by credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a moment , PLS . I'll write out a receipt for you .
segments.speaker: S1
